OOC: Hmm.  I see.
::Enertron::
    "Ack."  As Galvatron wraps his tail around his left arm he realizes what 
is about to happen.  He tries to use his right arm to slash the tail off of 
him but finds it restrained as well.  In desperation he uses one finger to 
emit a beam to cleave off the end of the tail.  Even this is only partially 
effective as his left arm is dislocated already.  With his left arm free, but 
wounded, he howls in pain as the teeth rip into his shoulder.  The fire burns 
his arm to a toasty brown and it falls limp and detaches from his side.

    As he was reeling in pain he heard the knee guns fire near him.  He 
vaguely felt the impact of the shots tearing into his sides.  He quickly 
focused and transformed back to his beast mode.  As it was much smaller he 
was able to slip out of the crushing hold and fly a short distance.  His 
beast mode was horribly mangled and weak so when he landed he returned to 
robot mode.  He quickly slammed himself into the ground to relocate his 
shoulder and stood up rotating it to regain feeling. He braces himself, ready 
for the next attack.
